snippet: Carlos Beltran, now with St. Louis, says he is not haunted by having made the out that ended the Mets’ last playoff run six years ago.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that St Louis Cardinals outfielder Carlos Beltran, formerly with the New York Mets, came the closest of any Cardinal to getting a hit during Mets pitcher Johan Santana's no-hitter.
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltran, now with St. Louis, says he is not haunted by having made the out that ended the Mets’ last playoff run six years ago.

headline.seo: Ex-Met Beltran Says He Isn’t Haunted by Playoff Strikeout
headline.main: Beltran’s One Wish Ignores That Strikeout
headline.print_headline: Beltran’s One Wish Ignores That Strikeout
